pr_title: ArC - fix post construct invocation for hierarchical cases with beans from different packages

timeline.message: ArC - fix post construct invocation for hierarchical cases with beans from different packages.

timeline.bodyText: This only logs private members in the code. Do we want some logging for the pack-private plus package split case too? Because effectively both scenarios force us into reflection which is something we want to avoid, right?
timeline.author: manovotn

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure. We could log something but the message would have to be quite "elaborate".
replies.author: mkouba

replies.bodyText: Yeah and the detection too (since this can happen on multiple places), not sure it's worth it.
replies.author: manovotn
